## MenuItem interface

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface MenuItem 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { MenuItem } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [group](#group-property) | <code>string</code> | Handler for the click behaviour |
|  [icon](#icon-property) | <code>IconName</code> | Icon of the menu item |
|  [label](#label-property) | <code>string</code> | Label of the menu item |
|  [onClick](#onclick-property) | <code>(event?: React.SyntheticEvent&lt;HTMLElement&gt;) =&gt; void</code> | Handler for the click behaviour |
|  [target](#target-property) | <code>LinkTarget</code> | Target of the menu item (i.e. new window) |
|  [url](#url-property) | <code>string</code> | Url of the menu item |

```typescript
group?: string;
```
